name: Roll with it (Absolute Narwhal)
description:
Roll with it is a 2D platformer where a dice rolled at the beginning dictates everything about the level, such as your max health, enemy placements and even the layout of the level. It's also very hard. This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours. The theme was "Roll of the Dice"

Controls
Walk - Left/Right arrow key
Jump - Up arrow key
Shoot - Right click
Pause game - Esc

Credits
Programming and Level Design - Absolute Narwhal
Art - G.wilaroo
Music - Adam Wheeler

A gameplay video and a devlog will be uploaded to my YouTube channel shortly after the jam. You can view the channel here.
